revised_title: Vibrations and Tones Produced by Contact of Bodies with Different Temperatures
tldr: The author investigates the vibrations and tones produced when two materials with different temperatures come into contact. They discovered that the vibrations are caused by the difference in temperature and the repulsive action of heat between the materials. This research led to the understanding of a new mechanical agency in heat, which has implications for the study of heat transfer and material science.
